trans-unit.source: Application Insights for Java web apps that are already live
trans-unit.target: Application Insights for Java web apps that are already live

trans-unit.source: Start monitoring a web application that is already running on your server
trans-unit.target: Start monitoring a web application that is already running on your server

trans-unit.source: Application Insights for Java web apps that are already live
trans-unit.target: Application Insights for Java web apps that are already live

trans-unit.source: Application Insights is in Preview.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights is in Preview.

trans-unit.source: If you have a web application that is already running on your J2EE server, you can start monitoring it with <link><linkText>Appliction Insight</linkText><title></title></link> without the need to make code changes or recompile your project.
trans-unit.target: If you have a web application that is already running on your J2EE server, you can start monitoring it with <link><linkText>Appliction Insight</linkText><title></title></link> without the need to make code changes or recompile your project.

trans-unit.source: With this option, you get information about HTTP requests sent to your server, unhandled exceptions and performance counters.
trans-unit.target: With this option, you get information about HTTP requests sent to your server, unhandled exceptions and performance counters.

trans-unit.source: You'll need a subscription to <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You'll need a subscription to <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: The procedure on this page adds the SDK to your web app at runtime.
trans-unit.target: The procedure on this page adds the SDK to your web app at runtime.

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you don't want to update or rebuild your source code.
trans-unit.target: This is useful if you don't want to update or rebuild your source code.

trans-unit.source: But if you can, we recommend you <link><linkText>add the SDK to the source code</linkText><title></title></link> instead.
trans-unit.target: But if you can, we recommend you <link><linkText>add the SDK to the source code</linkText><title></title></link> instead.

trans-unit.source: That gives you more options such as writing code to track user activity.
trans-unit.target: That gives you more options such as writing code to track user activity.

trans-unit.source: 1. Get an Application Insights instrumentation key
trans-unit.target: 1. Get an Application Insights instrumentation key

trans-unit.source: Log into the <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Portal</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: Log into the <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Portal</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Create a new Application Insights resource
trans-unit.target: Create a new Application Insights resource

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Click + and choose Application Insights</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Click + and choose Application Insights</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Set the application type to Java web application.
trans-unit.target: Set the application type to Java web application.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Fill a name, choose Java web app, and click Create</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Fill a name, choose Java web app, and click Create</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Find the instrumentation key of the new resource.
trans-unit.target: Find the instrumentation key of the new resource.

trans-unit.source: You'll need to paste this into your code project shortly.
trans-unit.target: You'll need to paste this into your code project shortly.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>In the new resource overview, click Properties and copy the Instrumentation Key</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>In the new resource overview, click Properties and copy the Instrumentation Key</linkText>

trans-unit.source: 2. Download the SDK
trans-unit.target: 2. Download the SDK

trans-unit.source: Download the <link><linkText>Application Insights SDK for Java</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Download the <link><linkText>Application Insights SDK for Java</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: On your server, extract the SDK contents to the directory from which your project binaries are loaded. If you’re using Tomcat, this would typically be under webapps\\WEB-INF\lib
trans-unit.target: On your server, extract the SDK contents to the directory from which your project binaries are loaded. If you’re using Tomcat, this would typically be under webapps\\WEB-INF\lib

trans-unit.source: 3. Add an Application Insights xml file
trans-unit.target: 3. Add an Application Insights xml file

trans-unit.source: Create ApplicationInsights.xml in the folder in which you added the SDK.
trans-unit.target: Create ApplicationInsights.xml in the folder in which you added the SDK.

trans-unit.source: Put into it the following XML.
trans-unit.target: Put into it the following XML.

trans-unit.source: Substitute the instrumentation key that you got from the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: Substitute the instrumentation key that you got from the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: The instrumentation key is sent along with every item of telemetry and tells Application Insights to display it in your resource.
trans-unit.target: The instrumentation key is sent along with every item of telemetry and tells Application Insights to display it in your resource.

trans-unit.source: The HTTP Request component is optional.
trans-unit.target: The HTTP Request component is optional.

trans-unit.source: It automatically sends telemetry about requests and response times to the portal.
trans-unit.target: It automatically sends telemetry about requests and response times to the portal.

trans-unit.source: Events correlation is an addition to the HTTP request component.
trans-unit.target: Events correlation is an addition to the HTTP request component.

trans-unit.source: It assigns an identifier to each request received by the server, and adds this as a property to every item of telemetry as the property 'Operation.Id'.
trans-unit.target: It assigns an identifier to each request received by the server, and adds this as a property to every item of telemetry as the property 'Operation.Id'.

trans-unit.source: It allows you to correlate the telemetry associated with each request by setting a filter in <link><linkText>diagnostic search</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: It allows you to correlate the telemetry associated with each request by setting a filter in <link><linkText>diagnostic search</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: 4. Add an HTTP filter
trans-unit.target: 4. Add an HTTP filter

trans-unit.source: Locate and open the web.xml file in your project, and merge the following snippet of code under the web-app node, where your application filters are configured.
trans-unit.target: Locate and open the web.xml file in your project, and merge the following snippet of code under the web-app node, where your application filters are configured.

trans-unit.source: To get the most accurate results, the filter should be mapped before all other filters.
trans-unit.target: To get the most accurate results, the filter should be mapped before all other filters.

trans-unit.source: 5. Restart your web app
trans-unit.target: 5. Restart your web app

trans-unit.source: 6. View your telemetry in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: 6. View your telemetry in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Return to your Application Insights resource in <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Return to your Application Insights resource in <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: HTTP requests data will appear on the overview blade.
trans-unit.target: HTTP requests data will appear on the overview blade.

trans-unit.source: (If it isn't there, wait a few seconds and then click Refresh.)
trans-unit.target: (If it isn't there, wait a few seconds and then click Refresh.)

trans-unit.source: <linkText>sample data</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>sample data</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click through any chart to see more detailed metrics.
trans-unit.target: Click through any chart to see more detailed metrics.

trans-unit.source: And when viewing the properties of a request, you can see the telemetry events associated with it such as requests and exceptions.
trans-unit.target: And when viewing the properties of a request, you can see the telemetry events associated with it such as requests and exceptions.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Learn more about metrics.</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Learn more about metrics.</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Add telemetry to your web pages</linkText><title></title></link> to monitor page views and user metrics.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Add telemetry to your web pages</linkText><title></title></link> to monitor page views and user metrics.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Set up web tests</linkText><title></title></link> to make sure your application stays live and responsive.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Set up web tests</linkText><title></title></link> to make sure your application stays live and responsive.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Capture log traces</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Capture log traces</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Search events and logs</linkText><title></title></link> to help diagnose problems.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Search events and logs</linkText><title></title></link> to help diagnose problems.
